SELECT u.nick, c1.ctn ctn, c2.ctn stateCtn, ch.* FROM challenge ch INNER JOIN user1 u ON ch.user_num = u.user_num INNER JOIN comm c1 ON ch.chg_lg = c1.lg AND ch.chg_md = c1.md INNER JOIN comm c2 ON ch.state_lg = c2.lg AND ch.state_md = c2.md
WHERE ch.chg_id = #{chg_id}

SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, chgbrdrn.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.brd_num , b.title, u.nick, b.view_cnt, b.reg_date FROM board b INNER JOIN user1 u ON b.user_num = u.user_num INNER JOIN challenge ch ON b.chg_id = ch.chg_id WHERE ch.chg_id = 1 AND brd_lg = 700 AND brd_md = 101 AND b.brd_step = 0 ) chgbrd ORDER BY chgbrd.reg_date ) chgbrdrn;
